widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: 2020 Year in Review:
config.description: You might have already read our "2020 Year in Review" series of Onward posts. It was a joint effort among multiple teams towards the end of the year.

config.title: Portal Content Update:
config.description: Without fail, we added more content for our visitors. Within this month, we added new 50-State Resources: Alimony Forms & Paternity Forms. We've also updated some of our COVID-19 center pages, such as Travel Restrictions, Information for Employees, Taxes, and more.

config.title: Updated Internal Announcements:
config.description: We have revamped some of our internal email announcements with a new design for work anniversaries, birthdays, and new team member welcome emails.

config.title: Holiday Donations:
config.description: Justia donated to “Feeding America” on behalf of our clients and to “Casa Colibri A.C.” on behalf of the Justia team. “Casa Colibri A. C.” helps vulnerable children and teenagers in Coahuila. “Feeding America” is the largest domestic hunger-relief organization in the United States.

config.title: Holiday cards to Justia Clients:
config.description: As a token of appreciation, Justia sent out holiday cards to its clients to highlight that we are thankful to work with them and cheer them up to cope with these hard times.

config.title: Sales Kept Coming In:
config.description: Despite the pandemic being in full swing almost the whole year, our sales team had weekly and monthly record-breaking sales.
